text: ivvaru ivarkal allahvin (arul mikka) anumati kontu jaluttin pataiyai muriyatittarkal;. Tavutu jaluttaik konrar;. Allah (tavutukku) aracurimaiyaiyum, nanattaiyum kotuttan;. Tan virumpiyavarraiyellam avarukkuk karpittan; (ivvitamaka)allah makkalil (nanmai ceyyum) oru kuttattinaraik kontu (timai ceyyum) marroru kuttattinarait tatukkavittal, (ulakam cirkettirukkum.) Ayinum, niccayamaka allah akilattar mitu perunkarunaiyutaiyonaka irukkiran
